remarks: Biconditional form of the Alexander Subbase Theorem ~ alexsub . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
alexsubb $p |- ( ( X e. UFL /\ X = U. B ) -> ( ( topGen ` ( fi ` B ) ) e. Comp <-> A. x e. ~P B ( X = U. x -> E. y e. ( ~P x i^i Fin ) X = U. y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d X x y $.
